evidence.text: Person B: That's why it's good to have a lawyer in the family.
Person A: I can always go in her place.

Person A: Seen Veroca?
Person A: Don't put that dirty hand in your mouth.

Person B: Hi, Mom. Where's Daddy?
Person A: Hi, dear. He's in the bedroom. 
Person B: Can I borrow a shirt, Dad?
Person B: Everything's going to be all right, honey.
Person B: Go to your bed, and we'll have breakfast together in the morning, ok?
Person B: That's enough, Ana Lúcia.
Person B: From now on, you come straight home from school. And nobody goes out on their own anymore.
Person B: You won't believe who was there.
Person A: Gilberto Gil! He was wearing polka- dot velvet pants. A Bob Marley song started playing, and he asked me to dance.
Person B: I am. Grandma and Grandpa are there, and you can stay with them now and then. Because I'm going back to college.
